artist: Artist: Jacob Binck; Artist: After Barthel Beham
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure with his back to viewer wearing coat with slashed sleeves; PR hand holding large staff; sword scabbard visible at PR hip
markings: brown stamp on verso, lower center: Paul Davidsohn (Lugt 654)
provenance: Paul Davidsohn, Grunewald-Berlin (sales 1920-21); John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Soldier with Halberd, Seen from the Back
